name: ABTraceTogether
notes: Official Alberta Government contact tracing app

name: ConTrac
notes: app for companies to track their employees' mental health and potential contacts

name: COVID Alert
notes: Built on top of COVID Shielf

name: Alipay Health Code + Close Contact Detector
notes: required to present colour code at all public settings for services, travel, etc.

name: Epidose
notes: runs on a raspberry pi and each user has a sensor

name: Ito
linkage_method: exchange temporary ids; when test positive, upload id generating function

name: AC19
notes: Withdrawn from Google Play store after concerns over spying

name: HaMagen
linkage_method: matched locations + times visited by  infected users sent from ministry of health to all users

name: diAry
notes: keeping a personal log of all movements

name: StopKorona!
notes: unique random ID is linked to phone number on central server

name: Smittestopp
notes: partnership with the Norwegian institute of public health (government?), linked to bank ID

name: WeTrace
notes: ordered everyone in the province of Cebu to download

name: MyLog14
notes: also collecting self-reported symptom data and offering coupons for bubble tea in exchange for giving up data

name: P6
notes: Privacy Preserving Proven Prior Proximity Protocol

name: ZeroBase
notes: QR code scanning, not contact tracing
